name: market for adobe brick | adobe brick | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/27955/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This market represents the traditional adobe bricks for construction in Ecuador.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included. In this market, expert judgement was used to develop product specific transport distance estimations.;The product 'adobe brick' represents bricks with clay as the main primary material. The adobe bricks weigh approximately 21.96 kg and have average dimensions of (23 x 48 x 13) cm (width x length x height). The forming process is done by hand.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'adobe brick', within the geography of Ecuador.

This activity ends with the supply of 'adobe brick', to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2392:Manufacture of clay building materials

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period was set identical to the corresponding transformation activity.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Transportation distance and truck type based on expert opinion specific for Ecuador.
